root.name: Battle Havoc
root.description: Battle Havoc is a fast paced multi-player action game with a unique twist on real-time artillery combat. Take to the air with rechargeable jets unleashing the power of over 20 different weapons and upgrades. Play Deathmatch or Elimination modes against 8 players over LIVE, System Link, or a single Xbox. Earn coveted Gold Medals as you race against the clock in 13 single-player time challenges.
